Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the money.
Reviews.Author: KayaMarie
Reviews.Content: The tablet is no iPad, but that's to be expected for the price range. It's pretty fast and can run most any app. Great for the lower price range. Also works to charge with any USB cable or the wall charger.

Reviews.Title: bad power plug
Reviews.Author: Laura very fun games I give it a 4
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet three months ago and now the charger on the tablet will not  charge very disappointed in this tablet I will not buy another one my daughter is very sad

Reviews.Title: like so far
Reviews.Author: teresa
Reviews.Content: Just bought for a present. Just up easily. Is for a friend travels for work but doesn't play games uses mainly for checking plane flights ,weather,news and email. This is perfect.

ProductInfo.Name: DOPO 1.2GHz 512MB 4GB 7" Capacitive Touchscreen Tablet Android 4.0 w/HDMI microSDHC & Webcam
